name: Wetland Mitigation Banking Program
objective: The Wetland Mitigation Banking Program supports the establishment and development of agricultural wetland mitigation banks to make credits available to producers. These credits help producers meet their wetland conservation compliance responsibilities to maintain eligibility for many USDA programs administered by the FSA and NRCS, and maintain eligibility for the Federal crop insurance premium subsidy administered by the USDA Risk Management Agency.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: NRCS recently announced eight new awards with a total NRCS investment of $7 million.

rules_regulations: 2 CFR Chapter IV; Wetland Conservation Compliance Provisions 7 CFR 12.4.
